skills.name: Slash Hook
skills.description: Attacks an enemy 2 times with fast punches. Each punch has a 50% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 1 turn.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +20%

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Shadow Burst
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and decreases the target's Attack Speed for 2 turns. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.multiplier_formula: 2.0*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.28*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Hostility (Passive)
skills.description: You reflect 10% of damage back to the enemy and fill up your Attack Bar by 30% each time. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Reflect DMG
skill_effect.description: 33% of incoming damage is reflected back at the attacker. This does not nullify any Status Effects.
